title: 各位最早用的开服器是什么
txt_content: 我用的是一个好像叫mcserver，记不清楚了

replies.author: 子龙i
replies.txt_content: 难道是单片机？？？

replies.author: Sonic1997
replies.txt_content: 直接自己写个启动脚本就好了啥的. .?没用过什么开服的工具

replies.author: 古明地兔
replies.txt_content: PaperSpigot

replies.author: qq2902812030
replies.txt_content: PaperSpigot把，不太记得了

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 第一次就某宝搜了一下，还是他们给出的教程慢慢学会开服。。。

replies.author: nhqs83
replies.txt_content: 好像叫啥旋律吧

replies.author: Iron-HIM
replies.txt_content: 要是说最早的话，还是我第一次接触服务器时用到的Minecraft-Server官方的图形服务器管理器

replies.author: C__C
replies.txt_content: 如果是mc的话 面板算吗?  哈哈哈哈哈

replies.author: jianpeiguo
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 时光小布丁
replies.txt_content: 开服器吗，CMD算吗(??ω??)

replies.author: 王自如
replies.txt_content: 没用过开服器，都是直接用脚本启动……

replies.author: kuikui851
replies.txt_content: 开启器？。。。 我是用bat 的

replies.author: mohuang521
replies.txt_content: 咳咳咳，开服侠

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: .bat开服器你值得拥有
用的网页开的那种服务器吧

replies.author: 寒都科技服
replies.txt_content: 最早是用bat开服 网上找个复制黏贴下来 直接启动！！！

replies.author: 希望之光.
replies.txt_content: .bat了解下多方便啊我第一次就是这个233

replies.author: timetraveler314
replies.txt_content:
我一开始是1.11.2 spigot
现在用1.12.2 spigot

replies.author: Sun_520
replies.txt_content: vps吧。。。我记得以前 vps还木有 都要手动开自己电脑的外网映射端口 现在有了vps就比较方便

replies.author: Sun_520
replies.txt_content: PaperSpigot吧
